application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Lime (T5) - Remove epicormic growth to 9m height. Crown lift 1 low western lateral by pruning 1.5m branch lengths. Remove deadwood. Standing in G8 of TPO.1 x Lime (T8) - Remove deadwood. Standing in G10 of TPO. (Exempt works)1 x Lime (T14) - Reduce lateral spread to south by 3m branch lengths. Standing in G10 of TPO.1 x Lime (T19) - Remove epicormic growth to 5m height. Standing in G10 of TPO.1 x London Plane (T21) - Crown lift to 5m height. Crown reduce northern canopy at 7m height by branch lengths of 2m to ensure 3m clearance from property. Standing in G7 of TPO.1 x Cedar (T27) - Reduce laterals to east at 15m height where most over-extended over building by up to 2m branch lengths to reduce encroachment. Remove deadwood. Standing in T3 of TPO.1 x Cedar (T30) - Reduce northern lateral growing from main stem at 10m height by up to 3m branch lengths. Remove deadwood. Standing in T2 of TPO.1 x Black Pine (T32) - Reduce lowest north west lateral by 2m branch lengths. Remove deadwood. Standing in G5 of TPO.1 x Lime (T49) - Fell. Standing in G7 of TPO.1 x Holly (T50) - Prune to give 3m clearance from swings. Standing in G7 of TPO.1 x Laurel (T52) - Prune to give 1.5m clearance from lamppost. Standing in G7 of TPO.1 x False Acacia (T71) - Crown reduce by 25% by pruning branch lengths of up to 3.5m height and 3m spread. Remove deadwood. Standing in G7 of TPO.1 x False Acacia (T75) - Reduce 2 over extended branches to north at 5m height by 2m branch lengths. Standing in G7 of TPO.1 x Lime (T93) - Crown lift to 4m height including removal of low branches. Standing in G1 of TPO.1 x Lime (T94) - Crown reduce height and spread to most recent reduction points. Standing in G1 of TPO.1 x Lime (T96) - Crown reduce height and spread to most recent reduction points. Remove deadwood. Standing in G1 of TPO.1 x Walnut (T101) - Fell Sycamore sapling to west. Prune western crown to 2m branch lengths. Standing in G3 of TPO.
